original_text: All the time that I ruled the land of Judah, I did not eat the government officer's special food. I was the ruler from the 20th year of King Artaxerxes until his 32nd year as king. For all those 12 years, I and my relatives refused to eat the special food.
korean_text: 또한 유다 땅 총독으로 세움을 받은 때 곧 아닥사스다 왕 제이십년부터 제삼십이년까지 십이 년 동안은 나와 내 형제들이 총독의 녹을 먹지 아니하였느니라

sentences.original_text: All the time that I ruled the land of Judah
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 유다 땅을 다스리던 모든 시간 동안

sentences.original_text: I did not eat the government officer's special food
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 관리의 특별한 음식을 먹지 않았습니다

sentences.original_text: from the 20th year of King Artaxerxes
I and my relatives refused to eat the special food
sentences.korean_translation: 나와 내 친척들은 특별한 음식을 먹기를 거절했습니다
